stories: As an Admin, I want to view user profiles so that I can monitor activity.
As an Admin, I want to create new user accounts so that I can add users to the system.
As a Manager, I want to edit content so that I can update information.
As an Editor, I want to upload video content so that I can publish media.
As a User, I want to register an account so that I can write blog posts.
As a Blogger, I want to write blog posts so that I can share my thoughts.
As a Customer, I want to modify my order so that I can change items.
As a Customer, I want to place an order so that I can purchase products.
As a Teacher, I want to manage assignments so that I can organize coursework.
As a Teacher, I want to create quiz assignments so that I can test students.
As a Student, I want to enroll in courses so that I can access learning materials.
As a Student, I want to access learning materials so that I can study effectively.
